title: [K-12] Integrated Instructional Design Simulation Training for Multicultural Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of multicultural education basics, with at least one year of teaching experience
context.additional_context: An intensive workshop where pre-service teachers experience real-life situations in multicultural classrooms through VR simulations and design teaching strategies based on the IMID model.

learning_goals: Learners can implement multicultural lesson design with over 80% completeness by applying the four domains of the IMID model (instructional methods, content, assessment, teacher commitment).
Analyze cultural conflict scenarios in VR simulation environments and propose appropriate mediation strategies three or more times.
Develop assessment tools reflecting learners' cultural background differences through multicultural education project outcomes, achieving peer evaluation scores of 4 or higher (5-point scale).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
